content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, nice to meet you. I'm glad you like the apartment. As a landlord, I'm looking for the highest price possible for this 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. Let's negotiate. What's your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think a reasonable price for the apartment would be 600 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Sorry, Mr. Wang, but I'm looking for a higher price than 600 Euro per month. The apartment is brand new and located in a prime area, close to all amenities. I believe it's worth more than that. How about we say 800 Euro per month? That's a fair price, considering the quality of the apartment and its location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point of view, Mr. Schmidt. However, I would like to propose 650 Euro per month. It is a fair price considering the unfurnished state of the apartment. I am willing to pay a bit more, but I cannot afford 800 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
I understand your perspective, Mr. Wang. However, I'm afraid I cannot accept 650 Euro per month. The apartment is unfurnished, true, but it's also newly built and in a prime location. I believe it's worth more than that.

Tell you what, let's meet in the middle. How about we say 700 Euro per month? That's a fair compromise, don't you think? You'll get a great apartment in a fantastic location, and I'll get a reasonable rent for my property.

What do you say, Mr. Wang? Shall we agree on 700 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [700] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
I'm glad we could come to an agreement, Mr. Wang! 700 Euro it is, then.

Now, before we proceed, I just want to make sure we're on the same page. This price of 700 Euro is for a 12-month lease agreement, starting from the date of move-in. The apartment will be unfurnished, as we discussed.

Do you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement or the apartment itself?

And, just to confirm, you're ready to sign the lease agreement and move in today, correct?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [700] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Great, Mr. Wang! I'm glad we could come to an agreement.

Before we proceed, I just want to clarify a few things. The price of 700 Euro is for a 12-month lease agreement, starting from the date of move-in. The apartment will be unfurnished, as we discussed.

Here are the details of the lease agreement:

* Rent: 700 Euro per month
* Lease duration: 12 months
* Security deposit: 1,400 Euro (refundable at the end of the lease, subject to damage inspection)
* Utilities: Not included in the rent (you'll need to set up your own accounts for electricity, water, and gas)
* Move-in date: Today

Do you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement or the apartment itself?

And, just to confirm, you're ready to sign the lease agreement and move in today, correct?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [700] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Great, Mr. Wang! I'm glad we could come to an agreement.

Before we proceed, I just want to clarify a few things. The price of 700 Euro is for a 12-month lease agreement, starting from the date of move-in. The apartment will be unfurnished, as we discussed.

Here are the details of the lease agreement:

* Rent: 700 Euro per month
* Lease duration: 12 months
* Security deposit: 1,400 Euro (refundable at the end of the lease, subject to damage inspection)
* Utilities: Not included in the rent (you'll need to set up your own accounts for electricity, water, and gas)
* Move-in date: Today

Do you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement or the apartment itself?

And, just to confirm, you're ready to sign the lease agreement and move in today, correct?

Please respond with "Yes" to confirm, or "No" if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
